homePageDesc: Our high-quality, patented pneumatic pinch valves are designed for various industries, ensuring durability and precision. Discover Swiss excellence with HO-Matic.
productsPageTitle: Pneumatic Pinch Valves for Industrial Applications
productsPageDesc: Explore HO-Matic's extensive range of high-quality pneumatic pinch valves. Designed for diverse industrial applications, our products offer unparalleled precision, durability, and efficiency.
pinchValvePageDesc: Discover HO-Matic's patented pneumatic pinch valves, renowned for their precision and durability. Our pinch valves cater to a wide range of industrial applications, ensuring reliable fluid control.
controlsPageDesc: Discover HO-Matic's control solutions and accessories designed to enhance the efficiency and precision of your fluid control system. Achieve optimal performance with our engineered products.
sleevesPageDesc: Explore HO-Matic's high-performance sleeves and accessories. Made from specially developed elastomer compounds with fabric inserts, our sleeves ensure robustness, high elasticity, and durability. Perfect for precise fluid control with a differential pressure of 2-3 bar.
resourcesPageDesc: Access comprehensive brochures and step-by-step instructions to enhance your experience with our products. Empower yourself with the knowledge and tools for optimal performance. Explore our downloads section to unlock the full potential of HO-Matic's world-class solutions.
newsPageDesc: Stay updated with the latest news and announcements from HO-Matic. Discover our innovations, industry insights, and more.
aboutPageDesc: Learn about HO-Matic's mission, values, and history. Discover our commitment to quality and innovation in fluid control solutions since 1977.
contactPageDesc: Get in touch with HO-Matic for inquiries, support, and more. Our team is ready to assist you with all your fluid control needs.
noticePageTitle: HO-Matic AG | Legal Notice & Company Information
noticePageDescription: Explore the legal notice and important company information for HO-Matic AG. Learn about our liability, intellectual property, and links to third-party sites.
privPageTitle: HO-Matic Privacy Policy | Data Protection & User Rights
privPageDesc: Read HO-Matic's Privacy Policy to learn how we handle personal data, your rights, and how we protect your information with secure measures.
cartPageDesc: Manage your HO-Matic cart and prepare for checkout. Shop high-quality pinch valves and accessories tailored to your industrial needs.
